title: Low Priority Queue When it's not my fault...
body: So this happened to me at least twice now. So when I get unusual lag and start dc'ing out of no where I'm forced to disconnect. After the game i get a low priority wait time. Just last game I was playing casually everything was fine, then all of a sudden i get a 3000-5000 ping spike and i keep disconnecting, my internet was fine and everything on my end was fine. So I was forced to quit the game. After I quit i tried reconnecting after I restarted my internet but the game ended during the reconnection and now I'm left with a 5 game 20 minute wait. It just makes me mad because it prevents me from playing with my friends because they aren't willing to wait.  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system treats all leaves equally even if it's not intentional, because leaves still cause negative experiences for players.  If you are still having this issue then your network might be having problems holding a strong connection.  I recommend using our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's going on, which will also provide troubleshooting steps to fix it.  It's important to get that resolved as the best method of improving your standing!  Hope that helps!

what about when i have good connection 80megabites per second and its on your side that its not connecting i try to play today 3/13/2017 two times and every time it says i was trying to reconnect i try to connect for the same reason i didnt wan any leaverbuster i even restar my computer i check my speed on my internet doing speedtest and it was all good so i try to play another game both of them aram games and it did the same it will not connect to your server and now i try to play and got put on the lower leaverbuster  ihave to w8 10 min five times can you remove me from leaverbuster it wasnt my fault please help me thank  you.
